game.title: The Lost Amulet
game.objective: Find the lost amulet of the ancient king.
game.description: The amulet was stolen from the king's tomb by a group of bandits. It is said to be hidden in a cave deep in the forest.
game.reward: The amulet, which is worth a fortune.

task.objective: Talk to the bandits at the forest camp.
task.description: Obtain information about the cave location.

task.objective: Examine the cave in the forest.
task.description: Fight the dragon or find a way to overcome its guard.

task.objective: Retrieve the amulet from the chest inside the cave.
task.description: Once the chest is opened, take the amulet.

task.objective: Return the amulet to the king at his castle.
task.description: Deliver the amulet to complete the quest.
